name: TaDa!
tag_list: gift, online-shopping, leisure, travel, experiences, spa, dining, escape, sport
overview:
We are selling packages of experiences by offering the choice of the final experience to the receiver. All our packages are sell in a giftbox and each product included 6 to 18 choices of experiences to choose from.

The service was launched in the 21st of October in Hong Kong. We are selling 200 types of different experiences (spa, beauty, dining, wine and food testing, escape in 5 stars, escape in Macau, yatching, snowboard, yoga, fitness, outdoor sport training…) and for all the targets (for him, for her, for them, for baby and new mum, for family).
